response: "datenprivatsphäre? was ist das noch mal? 🤔 in zeitalter von social media, online-shopping und digitalen services seems like everyone wants access to our personal information. 🙅‍♂️ but why do companies and governments need all this data? 🤷‍♂️ can't they just respect our privacy? 🚫 #privatsphärebleibt #datenschutz #respectourprivacy"
